thread.title: Emmerdale

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Emmerdale
text: Vanessa dreads the prospect of spending another day with Johnny at the hospital, and heads for the vets instead. However, Paddy and Rhona are quick to insist that she can take as long as she needs away from work, and when the sickly infant's incubator alarm sounds, his detached mother is nowhere to be found. Meanwhile, Bernice makes a shocking announcement to Kerry, Joanie is frustrated to discover Kyle knows Cain is his father, and Pollard offers David a cheque to compensate for the damage to his shop, but the gesture does not seem to mark a reconciliation for the pair.
